review.employee-type: Independent Consultant/Cetrified Skin Care Specialist (Current Employee)
review.title: “Great company!!!”
review.pros: Pros – L'BRI is by far the best direct sales company I have worked for. They care about their associates. And on top of everything I get to share these wonderful products with others. I have never seen a product as great as L'BRI. My customers feel the same way. Makes me feel great when a customer tells me how wonderful and great their skin looks and feels!!!
review.cons: Cons – Wish they would go live with the new website. Direct sales can be a tough business. Nothing to do with L'BRI. I just need to figure out how to get shows and recruits. Want to retire from my full-time job and do my L'BRI full time.

review.title: “Not a place I would work again.”
review.pros: Pros – Flexible schedule, work from home, able to put family first most of the time, can do things the way you want to for some of the things that are done.
review.cons: Cons – Company is more worried about their profits than helping their employees. Lack of training is also a problem with this company.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Build the careers of your employees, and the profits for the company will follow.
